short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that allows you to record user actions and create or edit roles based on them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power Roles is an Edge extension that helps administrators manage user roles more effectively within the Dynamics 365 Model-Driven App. This tool allows you to record user actions and then displays the necessary privileges needed to perform those actions. You can save the identified privileges as a new role or update an existing one, streamlining the role management process.
